"Facebook is the world's biggest social network and Google is not going to come up with another social network," he said. But they already have a massive social presence. "YouTube is the third biggest website in the world and massively social... Email is still the primary social communication media and Google is the fastest growing email provider in the world. "And they've got the largest blogging platform in the world so they are already a massive player in social, he added.
